      • createDeviceFromInetAddress

        public static Device createDeviceFromInetAddress​(java.net.InetAddress inetAddress)
        Creates a Device object from an InetAddress.
        Parameters:
        inetAddress - The InetAddress to create the Device object from.
        Returns:
        The newly created device object.

      • getValidIP

        public static java.lang.String getValidIP​(java.lang.String ip)
        Manipulates a string to ensure IP addresses are consistent.
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP string to check.
        Returns:
        The IP address string in upper case or null if invalid.

      • stripIpv6Brackets

        public static java.lang.String stripIpv6Brackets​(java.lang.String ip)
        IPv6 standard allows an IPv6 address to be surrounded by square brackets when used in URI/URLs. This method removes those brackets to ensure IP addresses are stored in the event in a consistent form.
